sentence.Network_en: The shareholder rights movement has two prongs.
sentence.Network_cn: 股东权利运动有两部分。

sentence.Network_en: Debenture holder has priority over ordinary shareholder.
sentence.Network_cn: 债券持有人比普通股东享有优先权.

sentence.Network_en: As I recall, you're not on the board, Joe; you're only a minor shareholder.
sentence.Network_cn: 我记得你并没有进董事会，乔，你只是一个小股东而已。

entry.def: A shareholder is a person who owns shares in a company.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who holds shares of stock in a corporation

auth_sentence.content: One company trimmed perks after an unusual shareholder revolt.

sentences.en: Shareholders will be voting on the merger of the companies.
sentences.cn: 股东们将投票表决公司合并问题。
